channel.title: Advertising Segment on FinanClub

item.title: 1114 GOOG
item.description: score:1114 Chances: Alphabet’s cloud segment grew 28% annually and posted its first profitable quarter, indicating potential growth opportunities in the cloud services business. The mixed results from Q1, with the advertising segment declining marginally but the cloud segment showing growth, suggest that investors are betting on Alphabet’s AI hype, which has contributed to the stock’s gain of 44% this year.
